::Cutthroat::

    The 4 shots hit Cutthroat, and he fell down butt-first.
=
  
   "No, I'm madder than you!" Cutthroat "corrected."

    Cutthroat ran =
at Blot, and tried to tackle him down to the ground.

ge -----

ith/Galactor Jets


  The shots banged against Blot's head, knocking him a =
bit dizzy.

  Blot: GRAAAA! Blot be soooooo madder than you are!

  Blot fi=
red each of his blasters (He has 2) twice at Cutthroat...

al Message -----

ns to Deal With/Galactor Jets


    ::Cutthroat::

    Cutthroat: Now you f=
ight too?  Harr, die!

    Cutthroat did a 180 degree spin to the side, and=
 the shot missed him.  Then, he took his gun and fired 3 shots at Blot.

        ::Cutthroat::

              Cutthroat, bei=
ng a copycat, and not wanting to lose an advantage, also transformed to rob=
ot mode.  He stood still, and the 4 shits hit him in the chest.  He looked =
a little dumbfounded for a moment, then whipped out his gun and shot 4 shot=
s back at Hun-Grr.

        OOC: Ok, I just said gun 'cause I don't know wh=
at weapons Cutthroat has in robot mode.
